comment: Very straightforward class and professor. There are a few discussion boards, 5 assignments (4 are with your group), and 2 tests, no lockdown.

Not a hard class at all. Just be aware that everything you do is group work for the most part. She was also pretty good at getting back via email, and was not a tough grader. Probably a good option to take if you need a class with out a heavy work load.
